text: Signal is an unincorporated community in Columbiana County, Ohio, United States. It is home to the Columbiana County Port Authority Signal rail terminal. ==History== A post office called Signal was established in 1890, and remained in operation until 1959. The origin of the name "Signal" is obscure. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Columbiana County, Ohio Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio
title: Signal, Ohio
